name: Wilder's Creation
description:
Wilder's Creation is a Halloween themed platformer. The story follows a pumpkin man created by the brilliant Dr. Wilder. The creation longs to experience life, but that's a bit difficult to do when you're stuck in a dungeon. So, the creation attempts to escape Dr. Wilder's mansion, armed with only its Spook Attack! 

Controls

WASD - Control player, navigate menus

Enter - Select 

Left Click - Spook Attack

1 - Reset To Menu
